divs: sighting detailson 10\16\2012 i was working at a water injection well on deskins rd in vansant va. at about 1:00 pm we noticed a bright shining cylinder high in the sky. it apeard to spin from time to time and reflect the sun light. it hoverd in one spot for a long time and then it slowley started moving to our right. while watching this we noticed a orb which came out of know where moving around and then it descende towards us and went by on our right about 30 to 40 feet away. it was lit like a light bulb about the size of a tennis ball with something moving inside. it followed the road and went up into the tree line and we lost sight of it.one guy said when the small orbe went past he felt at peace. also there wase some other orbs up higher next to the main object.we also saw some jets just befor seeing the main object.and jets after seeing the main object.also the cross shaped object flying frome right to left high in the sky it appeared to have a white glow to it. it was a very interesting day. and as i was saying there were multiple witnesses which were co-workers.and there was a feeling of excitement.the object moved off to the north west and i had to leave to return to the office.up on arrival to the office other co-workers were asking if i saw the object.so some of them saw it to there were passenger jets flying by and the main object was at a higher altitude.
